sentence.idiomatic: How do you compete with foreign investors?
Xiao Wang is competing with Xiao Li for the manager position.
We should compete friendly and fairly.
The competition among classmates is fierce.
How do you survive the competition?
It’s very important to have an environment of fair, healthy competition.
The battle is really fierce, and there have been serious casualties.
The business competition among companies is really fierce.
The mixture of these two chemicals causes a violent reaction.
If anything happened to him, I would become president.
If I can't come this afternoon, you will go to Beijing by yourself.
If you have any problems, please write to us.
The decline of exports means that economic growth will slow down drastically.
He slows down his pace and quietly walks into the room.
Although the tempo of the music has slowed down, she still can’t catch up with it.
They hold opposing views about this issue.
What is your opinion about it?
I don’t agree with you about the sports.
You will definitely be accepted into a university if you study hard.
You can make it as long as you want to.
If you finish the task on time, I’ll give you a raise.
The new market economic structure will attract more overseas investors.
Good service can attract more customers.
The beautiful scenery in Shanghai attracted a lot of tourists.
How's the business recently? I've heard it’s not bad.
Although business is good now, the market is very competitive. If by chance the economy slows down, it will have a large effect on my business.
I agree to your point of view. And competition is indeed tough at the moment. How can you compete in this market?
I must continue to produce high quality products at a reasonable price. As long as I can do that, I can continue to attract customers.
